      • getCurrentPortfolioDetailed

        java.util.List<PortfolioDetailedPojo> getCurrentPortfolioDetailed()
                                                           throws java.io.IOException
        Fetches from local file and provides current detailed portfolio data {(ticker_symbol, quantity) vs (buying price, currentPrice)} .
        Returns:
        list of maps containing ticker symbol, quantity vs buying price
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if data not found.

      • getPortfolioDetailedOnDate

        java.util.List<PortfolioDetailedPojo> getPortfolioDetailedOnDate​(java.lang.String date)
                                                          throws java.lang.Exception
        Fetches from local file and provides detailed portfolio data for a particular date {(ticker_symbol, quantity) vs (buying price, price on that day)} .
        Parameters:
        date - for which details need to be fetched.
        Returns:
        list of maps containing ticker symbol, quantity vs buying price
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if data for date not found or date is invalid.
        java.lang.Exception
